Posts.Content: kathleenk wrote: Hello All, This is my first post. So grateful this site exists. I have a million concerns but will start with this one. Planning L radical mastectomy with extensive node dissection at end of june. Any suggestions for clothing post op? Â I was thinking of large t shirts but have seen special camisoles etc. in catalogs. Any suggestions would be appreciated. Dx 5/21/2009, IDC, 4cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 9/9 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: clothing after surgery kathleenk Kathy16
